channel.title: Anarchy - Men Of Mayhem 718! best server out there! Custom bosses! Off-hands!
channel.description:
718/753 Runescape Private Server
Have you been looking for something different? The new hype? Tired of all these servers who have unfinished features, not enough features, or are just down right rude?
Then welcome to Anarchy! As the owner of Anarchy, my goal is to make the server into what the players want. I don't just take suggestions and throw them out, I take them, write them down, spread the word; and if popular demand says so, I add the suggestion!
So what can we possibly add that is different from any regular server? To be honest, no matter how much we code, plan, etc, in the end every private server is the same when it comes to features. But that's just features.. At Anarchy we strive to have the perfect staff, members who are there for you, listen to what you say, and help you in any possible way!
Don't be one of the silly ones who log in and think this server is just like any other one, don't be a fool! Stick around and you are sure to see the servers true colors! [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O0kD1ax3vdo&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [size=12pt][b] So what are you waiting for? Go play![/b][/size]
[b]Download webclient: (It may take some time to load at start and when you login, so give it some time download the cache :D)[/b] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/xrj8nagwxu78tgt/Anarchy.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/xrj8nagwxu78tgt/Anarchy.jar?dl=0[/url]
[b]forums : www.anarchy718.com/forum[/b] [b] Features:[/b] Eco based. Perfect PvM/PvP/Prayers. Perfect switching. [b]All skills 25 working! (level stats to lvl 120!)[/b] Donator zone! Fully working barbarian agility course + advanced! Fully working Gnome agility course + advanced! [b]4 Prestige ranks, each rank increases xp rates difficulty but with a reward![/b] [b]Drygores added! Custom bosses! 120 master capes added![/b] [b]Recipe for disaster minigame![/b]
A huge list of Player versus Monster teleports, being added more almost every day. Many working aura's, like Supreme corruption, Salvation and Harmony. All for sale! Squeal of fortune. Xp Counter. Money Pouch. [b]No items lost on death, unless you die in the wilderness, or in any unsafe PvP zone or at Corp, or if your on master prestige![/b] Nex sets with HP bonusses. Awesome xp in skilling, and combat. Including automated double EXP weekends. Easy teleporting/traveling by single click actions thanks to the quest tab. Handy noticeboard, which allows you to change your display name, and character look. Custom shop names, so it will be easy to find what you need. Loyality system: this gives you 250 points for playing each 30 minutes, these points can be used to buy aura's at the loyality shop. Nice starters, splitted in the combat triangle. you can either become a Melee'r for a melee starting set, Ranger for ranged or Mager for magic. And alot more, would be too long to write it all down here, just come and try for yourself.
Furthermore, Home is easily accesed by typing ::home. If you need some cash fast, try thieving a bit and sell the stolen goods to the general store. you could also loot anything you find, everything can be sold. [b]If you need any help, feel free to add Khayam and/or Armadyl010 to friends ingame and just ask.[/b]
[b]Media![/b] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/105bo80.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2jb87sz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/73i0dz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/15eg3lx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/egoe8m.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2rcttgz.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zg7l7p.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2n25g7.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rwqjjl.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2v9c4s9.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/j6mxyo.jpg[/img] [b]http://i48.tinypic.com/2eld1cx.jpg[/b]
[b][size=18pt]Join us now and help us grow![/size][/b]
